name: Islamic Cartography
description: A research corpus of Islamic cartographic and geographical texts
_source_note: Configure one of the source types below to drive inventory.json generation.

zotero_local._note: Reads Zotero's local SQLite DB. Requires Zotero desktop running. Set ZOTERO_LIBRARY_ID and COLLECTION_NAME in .env.

zotero_api._note: Reads from Zotero web API. No desktop app required. Set ZOTERO_LIBRARY_ID and ZOTERO_API_KEY in .env.

bibtex._note: Converts a BibTeX export to inventory.json. Run: python scripts/00_import_bibtex.py (planned)

csv._note: Converts a CSV export to inventory.json. Required columns: key, title, author, year.
